name: Lumberjack vs Monsters
description:
Lumberjack vs Monsters

You are a lumberjack and you must protect your family!

This is a project for Miz Jam 1.

Control scheme

Walk: WASD or Arrow

Hit: Left mouse button

Jump: Space

Interact: E

Credits

Designed, programmed by me

Arts by Kenney

Sounds from www.fesliyanstudios.com

Made with Unity

Source Code

https://github.com/GolfNorth/LumberjackVsMonsters
